CustomField.formula:
IF( Reporting_Date_to_Close_Date__c = True, CloseDate, IF(AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Existing Business-Renewal"), AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Existing Business-Upsell"), MRR__c < 0)),
CloseDate < Startdate_contract__c),
Startdate_contract__c,CloseDate))
CustomField.label: Reporting Date
